mapper.update: update shared set s_count=s_count+1 where s_no=#{sno} and not exists(select * from bookmark where s_no=#{sno} and m_no=#{mno})
mapper.select: select m_no as no, m_id as id, m_nickname as nickName, photo, m_level as userLevel from members where m_id=#{id} and m_pwd=#{password}
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where s_no=#{sno} and m_no=#{mno}
